title: 3 and Out - Excessive CFB QB Hype; NFL GM and HC Retread Habit; Week 16 Preview and 3 for the $ ATS Picks
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Excessive CFB QB Hype; NFL GM and HC Retread Habit; Week 16 Preview and 3 for the $ ATS Picks
description:
In this episode, John explains why the hype on incoming college QB's has gotten out of control, why the NFL consistently cycles through GM and coaching retreads, previews the slate of Week 16 games and gives his 3 for the $ ATS picks, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
